responses.about: PSTU stands for Patuakhali Science and Technology University, a public university in Bangladesh. It was established in 2000 and offers various courses and degrees in agriculture, science, and technology. It has two campuses: the main campus in Patuakhali and the outer campus in Babuganj. PSTU is the only science and technology university and the first public university in Barisal division

patterns: Who is Mahbubur Rahman at PSTU?
Can you provide information about Mahbubur Rahman?

responses.about: Mahbubur Rahman is an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Information Technology (CSIT) at Patuakhali Science and Technology University (PSTU) in Bangladesh. He has research interests in wireless sensor networks, cyber security, image processing, data science, and internet of things (IoT). He has published several papers in these fields and has received some awards for his work. He also teaches various courses related to computer science and engineering at PSTU. You can find more information about him on his :

patterns: Who is Dr. Samsuzzaman at PSTU?
Can you provide information about Dr. Samsuzzaman?

responses.about: Md. Samsuzzaman was born in Jhenaidah, Bangladesh in 1982. He received the B.Sc. and M. Sc. Degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Islamic University Kushtia, Bangladesh in 2005 and 2007, respectively. Currently, he is pursuing his Ph.D. degree in telecommunication engineering in the Universiti Kebangsaan Malaysia (UKM). From February, 2008 to February, 2011, he worked as a lecturer at Patuakhali Science and Technology University (PSTU), Bangladesh. From February 2011 to till now; he is working as an Assistant Professor at the same university. He has authored or co-authored approximately 14 referred journals and conference papers. He is currently a Graduate Research Assistant at the Institute of Space Science (ANGKASA), UKM, and Malaysia. His research interests include the RF, electromagnetic field and propagation, Antenna Technology, Satellite communication, WSN and Semantic Web.Linkedin : linkedin.com/in/md-samsuzzaman-b17834129

patterns: Who is Chinmay Bepery at PSTU?
Can you provide information about Chinmay Bepery?

responses.about: Chinmay Bepery is a professor in the Department of Computer Science and Information Technology (CSIT) at Patuakhali Science and Technology University (PSTU) in Bangladesh. He teaches various courses related to computer science and engineering at PSTU.
